tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: #1DBigAnnouncement- the new album 'Take Me Home'
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: Here it is... The latest 1D video announcement from the boys!! Watch it now to check out their MASSIVE news!! Make sure you give it a like and share and spread the word to the rest of the 1DFamily! PRE-ORDER YOUR COPY OF THE NEW SINGLE HERE smarturl.it The new album 'TAKE ME HOME' will be available to preorder from midnight on 3rd September in your local territories in your local store* *pre-order markets may vary, check your local site.

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Humanities
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: The branches of learning regarded as having primarily a cultural character and which usually include language, literature, history, mathematics and philosophy

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: bloody rich guys. can't afford a﻿ good camera.
Yes mum said i can get it :D i love one direction﻿ x
finallyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyy:) yeyyyyy:) i love them﻿ so much
i think it﻿ was a joke...
SO﻿ PUMPED!!
Yey!!! Finally!!﻿
I Stayed Up All Night, Now Take Me Home♥...﻿
dumbass directionator, SHUT THE FUCK UP AND GET OUT OF MY KITCHEN BEFORE I SMACK YOU﻿ WITH LOUIS PRADA BAG.
take﻿ me home? MOM, IM LEAVING, ONE DIRECTIONS TAKING ME HOME :'D
:O SO EXCITEDDD I seriously﻿ can't wait. So proud -3
FInallllllyyyyyyyyyyyy﻿
i love how they all laugh in﻿ these videos like their own secret private jokes, its so cute omg!
Wohooojuuu :)﻿
ohhh myyy gawwd we should totes get a﻿ prottesst and be all MAKE ZAYN TALK OH MY GOD .....no.
Niall's accent...﻿ Niall's f**king accent!!! <3
GLOBALLY!!!﻿ WOO!!!
up﻿ all night, take me home i bet the next album will be marry me?? i will xx
omg the comments ==' STFU﻿ ABOUT TALKING OH MY GOD ITS AN UPDATE FARKEN HELL
Awesome, It﻿ comes out 2 days before my birthday :3
oh my god finally yayyyy! i literally can't wait﻿ -3
There albums﻿ are like a story.....I've stayed "Up All Night" now "Take Me Home".....or "Call Me A Cab" xP
it was a joke FYI Zayn didnt say I﻿ word

I am so proud of these 5 boys that changed﻿ my life for ever and made me into the strong, confident and crazy young woman and proud directioner that I am. These 5 idiots have a Home in my heart forever. Home is where the Heart is. <3
what﻿ happen to the camera from the "live while we're young" update? xP

Reviewer.Movies: i love Drake & Josh , iCARLY , timmie turner .
Anime: Elfen Lied, Yu-Gi-Oh!/GX/5D's Pokemon, Clannad, Digimon, Sailor Moon, Hantaro, Dragonball Z/GT. Soaps: Eastenders, Emmerdale, Coronation Street. The Vampire Diaries, The Bill ECT
Reviewer.Music: Miley Cyrus, Selena Gomez, Demi Lovato, Mitchel Musso, Jesse McCartney, Justin Bieber, John Schneider, Anime, Disney

Reviewer.Movies: Step up, Lucky Number Slevin, Fame and many more
